reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 12/18: TRANSITION - ESTABLISHMENT OF MINING AND LANDS TRIBUNAL
reg_info.reg_name_text: TRANSITION – ESTABLISHMENT OF MINING AND LANDS TRIBUNAL
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 12/18: TRANSITION - ESTABLISHMENT OF MINING AND LANDS TRIBUNAL

content.content: 1. (1) For the purposes of constituting the Mining and Lands Tribunal under section 6 of the Act, the Lieutenant Governor in Council shall appoint each deputy mining and lands commissioner who remains in office on March 31, 2018 as a first member of the Tribunal as of April 1, 2018. (2) The appointment of a deputy mining and lands commissioner to the Mining and Lands Tribunal shall specify that his or her term of office terminates on either of the following dates: 1.  The day his or her term of office as deputy mining and lands commissioner would have expired. 2.  July 17, 2019.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) For the purposes of constituting the Mining and Lands Tribunal under section 6 of the Act, the Lieutenant Governor in Council shall appoint each deputy mining and lands commissioner who remains in office on March 31, 2018 as a first member of the Tribunal as of April 1, 2018.

(2) The appointment of a deputy mining and lands commissioner to the Mining and Lands Tribunal shall specify that his or her term of office terminates on either of the following dates:

1.  The day his or her term of office as deputy mining and lands commissioner would have expired.

2.  July 17, 2019.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
